title: Pamala Stanley - Coming Out Of Hiding - The Sequel (1990)
description:
Coming Out of Hiding...The Sequel
Pamala Stanley


Track Listings

1. Rhiannon
2. Body Time
3. Got the Fever
4. Coming Out of Hiding... The Sequel
5. This Is Hot
6. I Don&#039;t Want to Talk About It
7. If Looks Could Kill
8. It Would Be So Easy
9. Taking It Slow
BONUS - remixes of Coming Out of Hiding, I Don&#039;t Want To Talk About It

I have always enjoyed Pamala Stanley&#039;s music in the 80&#039;s. Her two biggest Hi-NRG/Dance hits were "I Don&#039;t Want To Talk (About It)" and "Coming Out Of Hiding". The version on this CD of "Coming Out Of Hiding" is an updated one and for those of you like myself, who are use to the original dance version, you might be disappointed. Another disappointment for me was the version of "If Looks Could Kill". They opted for the rock version (very similar to Heart&#039;s version) rather than the Dance/Hi-NRG version (IMHO a better rendition).Other selections include her early "This is Hot" and the cover of Stevie Nick&#039;s "Rhiannon" which she does an expert job on.
